website_summaries.verdict: These shoes are incredibly hot but also incredibly tall. They may be worth it for special occasions but don't expect to wear them regularly.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Hurts at ball of the foot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe.  Mediocre arch support. High heel.
customer_reviews.text: I can handle 4" plus heels, but I have a high arch, and these shoes lack the arch support I need. I typically wear a 9.5, but ordered a 10 and the 10 fit fine. I have a narrowish foot and the fit was fine - snug, but comfortable. So those of you with wider feet, may want to re-consider.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Miller

customer_reviews.title: Obsesssed.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are GORGEOUS! They fit a lot better than I expected and were a lot more comfortable than I felt I could have hoped for after reading the reviews. They are also exactly what I needed and will get a lot of use. Sturdy, flattering, and ultra versitile. I am going to the Bahamas for a few days and will try to update afterwards on how comfortable or excruciating they are for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn S.

customer_reviews.title: Wish they sold a 10 N...The length is perfect, the width is a little large.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great, but if you have narrow feet the lower band will be a little large. The length is perfect, the width is a little large. I wish they would know that people with longer feet do not necessarily have wider feet. Wish they sold a 10 N
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I don't wear them very often, but they are nice. The leather is of good quality and they don't cause any bruising to my skin. The heels seem a little big for my personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: seeSharp

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are worth it
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is fabulous.. It runs true to size and I have wide feet... This was my first expensive heel and it was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Katty T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes the come true to size. I received compliments for how they stood out because of the pretty gold. I'm rating them low because I wore them twice and the gold rubbed off the pad of the toe area :( $170 for the color to wear off after two wears was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Great color but extra tall heel
customer_reviews.text: Great nude color and material - look exactly as promised! Should be noted that the heel is taller than similar shoe from other designers (Sam Edelman, Steve Madden, Target). The extra 1/4”-1/2” definitely makes a difference and the shoe isn’t as comfortable or easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looks and quality, they are beautiful. I am not used to such high heels, but I bought them for a wedding. Will have to get used to wearing them, but they feel pretty comfortable considering the height of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Oana Urs

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes but my toes always seem to slip ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but my toes always seem to slip down. I have tried the slip in pads but they don't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but i had to return them
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but i had to return them, since the heel did not match the one that I bought, and the size was a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: LOURDES SUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for walking around -- almost 4" heel
customer_reviews.text: Very high. Not comfortable for walking around -- almost 4" heel. They ARE pretty.
customer_reviews.author: B.M.V.

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight😍
customer_reviews.text: I own more than a few pairs of Schutz and I must say in true Schutz fashion these shoes are ERVERYTHING!! Love at first sight😍
customer_reviews.author: malikah muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoes though
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I was expecting. I should have gotten another half size down. Pretty shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius Botelho

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe though
customer_reviews.text: Too high for me to walk in with such little support. Super cute shoe though!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and classy. The length was perfect but shoe is very narrow. Btw, I have an average foot width.
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Hurry before they're all gone.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes...cork heel and leather insole mean a very comfortable shoe. I love the soft color!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Not for every toe
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but are uncomfortable. Definitely a shoe for thin toes. My toes are average and the front strap is tight and feels very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Doris Dimino

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are gorgeous! But it came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are gorgeous! But it came with a scratch on the shoes (very visible)! Recommendations: for the next time take care at the time of making the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: but they are great for me
customer_reviews.text: These heels may not be for everyone, but they are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: More of a light grey than the nude shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Christopherson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am a faithful heel wearer! I am also a true 8.5. I wore these to a concert with minimal standing. The strap started to hurt after the first hour around my pinkie-toe area. I own other Schutz shoes and I must say that I was very disappointed with these shoes. It is a beautiful shoe (no denying it), but if I hadn't wore these shoes, I would have returned them. They were a bit slippery under the bottom. I wore these shoes for about 4 hours and I was so READY to take them off by the time I made it home.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoe and
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe and, sexy, too! I had them on for at least 5 hours straight and they did not hurt. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: China

product_meta.title: SCHUTZ Women's Enida Sandals
product_meta.description: Open toe sandal with block heel
feature_bullets: Smooth nubuck composes these refined Schutz sandals. Slim ankle strap with buckle closure. Chunky covered heel. Leather sole.
